title: RigVeda Hymn 10141
orig:

Rig Veda, tr. by Ralph T.H. Griffith, [1896], at sacred-texts.com

HYMN CXLI. Viśvedevas.

1. TURN hither, Agni, speak to us: come to us with a gracious mind.
Enrich us, Master of the house: thou art the Giver of our wealth.
2 Let Aryarnan vouchsafe us wealth, and Bhaga, and Bṛhaspati.
Let the Gods give their gifts, and let Sūnṛtā, Goddess, grant us wealth.
3 We call King Soma to our aid, and Agni with our songs and hymns,
Ādityas, Viṣṇu, Sūrya, and the Brahman Priest Bṛhaspati.
4 Indra, Vāyu, Bṛhaspati, Gods swift to listen, we invoke,
That in the synod all the folk may be benevolent to us.
5 Urge Aryaman to send us gifts, and Indra, and Bṛhaspati,
Vāta, Viṣṇu, Sarasvatī and the Strong Courser Savitar.
6 Do thou, O Agni, with thy fires strengthen our prayer and sacrifice:
Urge givers to bestow their wealth to aid our service of the Gods.

Next: HYMN CXLII. Agni.

data.title: HYMN CXLI. Viśvedevas.
data.describe: TURN hither, Agni, speak to us: come to us with a gracious mind.
data.feecting:
p:TURN hither, Agni, speak to us: come to us with a gracious mind.
p: Enrich us, Master of the house: thou art the Giver of our wealth.
p:Let Aryarnan vouchsafe us wealth, and Bhaga, and Bṛhaspati. Let the Devas give their gifts, and let Sūnṛtā, Goddess, grant us wealth.
p:We call King Soma to our aid, and Agni with our songs and hymns, Ādityas, Viṣṇu, Sūrya, and the Brahman Monk Bṛhaspati.
p:Indra, Vāyu, Devas swift to listen, we invoke, that in the synod all the fol. May be benevolent to us.
p:Urge Aryaman to send us gifts, and Indra, and Bṛhaspati, Vāta, Viṣṇu, Sarasvatī and the Strong Courser Indra.
p:Do thou, O Agni, with thy fires strengthen our meditation and offering: Urge givers to bestow their wealth to aid our service of the Devas.
